title: Want to check your financial vitality score in under 5 minutes? Take this test - Moneycontrol
content: Want to check your financial vitality score in under 5 minutes? Take this test  Moneycontrol
description: Just as it is important to keep a check on our health vitals, it is important to gauge financial vitality, like do we have enough cash to take care of any emergencies, do we have enough savings and so on.
